channel.title: blog on Huilin Li
channel.description: Recent content in blog on Huilin Li

item.title: 4 levels of protein structure
item.description: There are four levels of protein structure: primary, secondary, tertiary and quaternary. Primary Structure. # A protein’s primary structure is the unique sequence of amino acids in each polypeptide chain that makes up the protein. fasta file sequence of 20 amino acids Secondary Structure # Reference: # 3.9: Proteins - Protein Structure

item.title: Bash Scripts
item.description: Bash Scripts # How to discard changes in VScode? # Navigate to reporsitory (has .github folder) with changes. Then, git restore <file> Activate conda environment in bash script # source ~/miniconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh conda activate ENV SBATCH Array jobs # #SBATCH -J array-job #SBATCH -a 1-3 #SBATCH -o array-job.%A.%a.log id_list="./id_list.txt" id=`head -n $SLURM ARRAY TASK ID $id_list | tail -n 1` python3 script.py -in $id

item.title: Hugo commands
item.description: Introduction # Some commands and issues you might want to know when building a website, including inserting images and resize and center images,adding emoji, travel map, linking to pages and titles, and so on. How to insert images and resize and center images? # The file tree is like ├─content │ │ _index.md │ │ │ └─posts │ │ hugo.md │ │ _index.md │ │ │ └─images │ Nice.png In hugo.

item.title: Website via Hugo Book and deployed by Github Action
item.description: In Windows10, build personal website via Hugo-book and Github Actions # This blog is about how to use Hugo to create the local website, and then deploy it on GitHub via Github Action. Everything is step by step. Prerequisites # Git Windows 10 VScode Github account Install Hugo # In Windows10, right click Windows Powershell and click run as administrator. Refer to How to install chocolatey in Windows to install chocolatey.
